alert.note: Alert for Madison; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 1:23AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison and northeastern Onondaga Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 123 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Syracuse, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Onondaga, Syracuse, Cicero, De Witt, Sullivan, North Syracuse, Solvay, Chittenango, Fayetteville and Minoa. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 34A and 37. New York Interstate 81 near 16A, and between 17 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
